noPidError: you need to add the publish id of a published google spreadsheet as query parameter like "pid=[the pid]"
tastingInfoTitle: Click on a row to display all scores for a wine.
tastingInfoLowDesc: denotes the lowest score of a column
tastingInfoHighDesc: denotes the highest score of a column
scoreAlreadySubmitted: You have already submitted your scores
ScoringScaleMinMaxDesc: You can award points between {min} and {max} for every wine
ScoringNotInRangeError: Die Bewertung muss zwischen {min} und {max} liegen
